subject: Re: Exploring Cooperate - SIMSONN
description_text:
Hello,

All the partnership suggestions you mentioned are great. I'm open to
conducting reviews, comparisons, and sponsored videos showcasing your
products and brand every week, or other similar content. We can negotiate a
very good CPM that works for you and is better than running ads yourself.

Example of video: How these racing pedals helped me drift better

Best,
Stuart

IG: mind.roam.v1 - https://www.instagram.com/mind.roam.v1/

Tiktok: mind.roam - https://www.tiktok.com/@mind.roam

YT: mindroam - https://www.youtube.com/@mindroamv1
Personal Design Portfolio: stuarttrejos.com

On Tue, Jun 3, 2025 at 6:40 AM General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> Hi Stuart,
>
> Thank you so much for reaching out and for your interest in SIMSONN
> products! We truly appreciate your support and are excited by the
> possibility of working together.
>
> Your content and audience sound like a perfect fit for our brand, and we’d
> love to explore potential collaboration opportunities with you. Could you
> please share more details about the kind of partnership you have in
> mind—whether it's product reviews, sponsored content, giveaways, or
> something else?
>
> We’re looking forward to your ideas and are excited to see how we can work
> together to bring our sim racing gear to more enthusiasts.
>
> Best regards,
> SIMSONN Team
>
